games.name: Castlevania: Lament of Innocence
hints: This game was released in 2003 for the PlayStation 2.
It is an action-adventure game that takes place in a gothic setting.
The game follows the story of a knight named Leon Belmont who is on a quest to rescue his betrothed.
The game features a variety of weapons and magic spells that can be used to defeat enemies.
The game is part of the Castlevania series, which has been around since the 1980s and has a dedicated fanbase.

The game is known for its challenging difficulty level and is considered one of the best games in the Castlevania series.

games.name: Metroid Prime
hints: This game was released in the early 2000s.
It is a first-person adventure game featuring a female protagonist.
The game was developed by Retro Studios and published by Nintendo.
The game features a unique gameplay mechanic where the player can switch between first-person and third-person perspectives.
The game was critically acclaimed and won several awards, including Game of the Year.

games.name: Super Metroid
hints: This game was released in 1994 for the Super Nintendo Entertainment System (SNES).
It is a side-scrolling action-adventure game.
The game features a female protagonist named Samus Aran, who is a bounty hunter.
The game is known for its non-linear gameplay and exploration elements.
It is considered one of the greatest video games of all time and has influenced many other games in the genre.

hints: This game was released in the mid-80s.
It is a science fiction action-adventure game.
The game was developed by Nintendo and features a female protagonist named Samus Aran.

The game has spawned a successful franchise with numerous sequels and spin-offs, including Metroid Prime and Metroid: Other M.

games.name: Metroid Dread
hints: This game is part of a long-running video game franchise that started in the 1980s.
It is a 2D action-adventure game that features a female protagonist named Samus Aran.
The game was first announced in 2005 but was cancelled and remained in development limbo for over a decade.
The game introduces new enemies called E.M.M.I.s that relentlessly hunt the player throughout the game.
Metroid Dread is the fifth and final installment in the current story arc of the Metroid series, concluding the story that began with Metroid Fusion.

games.name: Pokémon Ranger
hints: This game was released for the Nintendo DS in 2006.
It is an action-adventure game that takes place in the Pokémon universe.
The game's main mechanic involves using a device called the Capture Styler to capture and befriend wild Pokémon.
The game features a unique storyline that involves stopping a group of villains from using Pokémon for their own nefarious purposes.
The game received a sequel, Pokémon Ranger: Shadows of Almia, which was released in 2008.

hints: This game was released in the year 2000.
It is a strategy game featuring creatures from a popular video game franchise.
The game was developed by Nintendo and was exclusive to the Nintendo 64 console.
The game features a variety of battle modes, including a Gym Leader Castle and a Stadium mode.
The game also includes a feature that allows players to transfer their Pokémon from the Game Boy games to battle in 3D on the big screen.

games.name: Pokémon Stadium
hints: This game was released in the late 90s for the Nintendo 64 console.
It is a strategy game that allows players to battle with their Pokémon in a 3D arena.
The game features a variety of mini-games that can be played with friends.
It was developed by HAL Laboratory, the same studio behind the popular Kirby game series.
The game also allowed players to transfer their Pokémon from the Game Boy games to battle in 3D, making it a popular choice for Pokémon fans.

games.name: Pokémon Gold/Silver
hints: This game was released for the Game Boy Color in the year 2000.
It is the second generation of the Pokémon video game series.
The game features 100 new Pokémon, in addition to the 151 from the first generation.
The game introduced new features such as breeding, day and night cycles, and the ability to hold items.
The game takes place in the Johto region and features the legendary Pokémon Ho-Oh and Lugia.

games.name: Pokémon Ruby/Sapphire
hints: This game is part of a popular video game franchise that originated in Japan.
It was released for the Game Boy Advance in 2002 in Japan and 2003 in North America.
The game takes place in the Hoenn region and features new Pokémon not found in previous games.
The game introduced new features such as double battles and Pokémon abilities.
The game was remade for the Nintendo 3DS in 2014 as Pokémon Omega Ruby/Alpha Sapphire.

games.name: Pokémon XD: Gale of Darkness
hints: This game was released exclusively for the Nintendo GameCube console.
It is a role-playing game set in the Pokémon universe.
The game features a new region called Orre, which is different from the regions featured in other Pokémon games.
The game introduces a new type of Pokémon called Shadow Pokémon, which are corrupted and need to be purified.
The game was developed by Genius Sonority, the same studio behind another Pokémon console game, Pokémon Colosseum.

The game introduced new features such as the ability to run, a new region to explore after completing the main story, and the ability to trade and battle with other players using a wireless adapter.

games.name: Super Mario Sunshine
hints: This game was released in 2002 for the Nintendo GameCube.
It is a 3D platformer game featuring the iconic character Mario.
The game takes place on a tropical island called Isle Delfino, where Mario must clean up pollution caused by an imposter who looks like him.
The game features a unique water-spraying device called F.L.U.D.D. that Mario uses to clean up the island and navigate through levels.
Super Mario Sunshine is considered one of the best games in the Mario franchise and has a devoted fanbase.

It is a platform game featuring Mario and his friends.
Unlike the first Super Mario Bros. game, this one allows players to choose between four different characters, each with their own unique abilities.
The game was originally developed as a different game in Japan, but was later rebranded as a Mario game for its release in North America and Europe.
The game is known for its challenging difficulty level and unique gameplay mechanics, such as the ability to pick up and throw objects.

It is an action-adventure game that follows the story of a young hero named Link.
The game features a top-down perspective and a large, open world to explore.
The game introduced many new gameplay mechanics, including the ability to travel between two parallel worlds.
The game is widely regarded as one of the greatest video games of all time and has been re-released on multiple platforms, including the Game Boy Advance and the Nintendo Switch Online service.

The game received critical acclaim for its engaging story, innovative gameplay mechanics, and beautiful art style.

hints: This game was released for the Nintendo 64 console in the year 2000.
It is an action-adventure game and the sixth installment in the Legend of Zelda series.
The game features a unique time-traveling mechanic where the player must relive the same three-day period over and over again.
The game takes place in the land of Termina, which is in danger of being destroyed by a falling moon.
The game is known for its dark and eerie atmosphere, and is considered by many to be one of the best games in the series.

hints: This game was released in 1998 for the Nintendo 64 console.
It is an action-adventure game that follows the story of a young hero named Link.
The game features a time-traveling mechanic that allows players to explore the same world in different time periods.
The game was highly praised for its music, which was composed by Koji Kondo.
The game is considered by many to be one of the greatest video games of all time and has been re-released on multiple platforms, including the Nintendo 3DS.

games.name: Street Fighter IV
hints: This game was released in 2008.
It is a fighting game featuring a roster of characters with unique fighting styles and special moves.
The game was developed and published by Capcom, a Japanese video game company known for creating popular game franchises such as Resident Evil and Mega Man.
The game introduced a new gameplay mechanic called the Focus Attack, which allows players to absorb an attack and counterattack.
The game received critical acclaim and was considered a return to form for the Street Fighter series, leading to multiple updates and a large competitive scene.

It was released in 2016 and is the fifth main installment in the series.
The game features a roster of 16 playable characters at launch, with additional characters added through DLC.
The game introduces a new V-Gauge mechanic that allows players to perform powerful V-Skills, V-Reversals, and V-Triggers.
The game has a strong competitive scene, with tournaments held around the world and professional players competing for large cash prizes.

It is an action role-playing game that takes place in a dark fantasy world.
The game is known for its high level of difficulty and punishing gameplay mechanics.

The game has spawned a popular franchise, including two sequels and a spin-off game.

games.name: Guilty Gear
aliases: Guilty Gear X2 Accent Core Plus
hints: This game was first released in 1998.
It is a fighting game featuring a diverse cast of characters with unique fighting styles and abilities.
The game is known for its fast-paced gameplay and complex mechanics, including a unique "Roman Cancel" system.
The game has a heavy metal-inspired soundtrack and a distinctive visual style that combines anime-style character designs with detailed 2D backgrounds.
The game has spawned multiple sequels and spin-offs, and is considered one of the most influential fighting game franchises of all time.

The game features a roster of both new and returning characters, including classic favorites like Scorpion and Sub-Zero.
Mortal Kombat 11 introduces a new gameplay mechanic called "Fatal Blows," which are powerful moves that can be used once per match when a player's health drops below a certain threshold.
The game also includes a cinematic story mode that continues the narrative of the previous game, Mortal Kombat X.

It is a fighting game that features a diverse cast of characters, each with their own unique weapon and fighting style.
The game is known for its weapon-based combat system, which allows players to use a variety of swords, axes, spears, and other weapons to defeat their opponents.
The game has a strong emphasis on single-player content, including a story mode and various challenge modes.
The game has spawned multiple sequels and spin-offs, and is considered one of the most iconic fighting game franchises of all time.

games.name: Banjo-Kazooie
hints: This game was released in the late 90s for the Nintendo 64 console.
It is a 3D platformer game developed by Rare, a British video game company.
The game follows the story of Banjo, a bear, and Kazooie, a bird, as they try to stop the evil witch Gruntilda from stealing Banjo's sister's beauty.
The game features a variety of worlds to explore, each with its own unique challenges and puzzles.
The game was critically acclaimed and is considered one of the best platformers of all time.

It is a platformer game featuring a bear and a bird as the main characters.
The game is known for its unique gameplay mechanics that allow players to build and customize their own vehicles.

aliases: Tales of Symphonia: Dawn of the New World

hints: This game was released in the early 2000s.
It is a role-playing game (RPG) that was developed by Namco Tales Studio.
The game features a unique battle system called the "Linear Motion Battle System" that allows players to move freely around the battlefield.
The game has a deep and complex story with multiple endings depending on the player's choices.
The game was critically acclaimed and is considered one of the best RPGs of all time, with a loyal fanbase that continues to support the series to this day.

games.name: Tales of Zestiria
hints: This game is part of a popular Japanese RPG series.
It was released in 2015 for PlayStation 3 and PlayStation 4.
The game features a unique battle system that allows players to fuse with elemental beings called Seraphim.
The story follows a young man named Sorey who is on a quest to save the world from a malevolent force known as the Lord of Calamity.
The game features a large open world to explore, with hidden dungeons and side quests to discover.

games.name: Tales of Berseria
hints: This game is part of a popular Japanese RPG series.
It was released in 2016 for PlayStation 4 and PC.
The game's protagonist is a young woman named Velvet who seeks revenge against a powerful figure in her world.
The game features a unique combat system called the "Liberation-LMBS" which allows for more dynamic battles.
The game received critical acclaim for its story, characters, and gameplay, and is considered one of the best entries in the series.

games.name: Tales of Arise
hints: This game is part of a long-running series of Japanese role-playing games.
It was released in 2021 for multiple platforms, including PlayStation and Xbox consoles.
The game features a unique art style that combines anime-inspired character designs with realistic environments.
The combat system in this game is fast-paced and action-oriented, allowing players to chain together combos and special moves.
The story of this game follows a group of characters from two different worlds who must come together to fight against a common enemy and save their respective homelands.

games.name: Persona 2: Innocent Sin
hints: This game is a part of a popular Japanese RPG series.
It was originally released in 1999 for the PlayStation console.
The game features a unique combat system where players can negotiate with enemies to gain their allegiance.

This game was remastered and re-released for the PSP in 2011, with updated graphics and additional content.

games.name: Persona 5
hints: This game is a Japanese role-playing game (JRPG) developed by Atlus.
It was released in 2016 for the PlayStation 3 and PlayStation 4 consoles.
The game follows a group of high school students who become "phantom thieves" and explore a supernatural realm called the Metaverse.
The game features turn-based combat and a social simulation aspect where the player can build relationships with other characters.
The game has received critical acclaim for its story, characters, and gameplay, and has been praised for its themes of rebellion and social commentary.

games.name: Personage 4
hints: This game is a role-playing game (RPG) developed by Atlus.
It was originally released for the PlayStation 2 in 2008.
The game takes place in a small town in Japan where a series of murders have been occurring.
The main character and his friends must enter a mysterious alternate dimension called the "TV World" to solve the murders and save their town.
The game has been praised for its deep and complex story, memorable characters, and unique gameplay mechanics, such as the ability to summon and fuse different personas to gain new abilities.

games.name: Persona 3
hints: This game was released in 2006 for the PlayStation 2.
It is a role-playing game developed by Atlus.
The game takes place in a fictional Japanese city and follows a group of high school students who have the ability to summon powerful creatures called Personas.
The game features a unique gameplay mechanic called the "Social Link" system, which allows players to build relationships with non-playable characters and strengthen their Personas.
The game has multiple endings, including a controversial ending that has become a topic of discussion among fans.

hints: This game was released in 2010.
It is an action-adventure game that takes place in a post-apocalyptic world.
The game features a protagonist named War, one of the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse.
The game draws inspiration from various mythologies and features a mix of puzzle-solving, exploration, and combat.
The game has spawned multiple sequels and spin-offs, including Darksiders II, Darksiders III, and Darksiders Genesis.

It is a side-scrolling run and gun game.
The game was developed by SNK, a Japanese video game company.

The game has spawned multiple sequels and spin-offs, and is known for its challenging gameplay and detailed pixel art graphics.

hints: This game was released in 2015 for multiple platforms.
It is an action-adventure stealth game developed by Kojima Productions.
The game is set in an open world environment and features a day-night cycle and dynamic weather system.
The game's protagonist is a mercenary named Venom Snake, who is on a mission to exact revenge on those who destroyed his forces and almost killed him.
The game received critical acclaim for its gameplay mechanics, story, and graphics, and is considered one of the best games in the Metal Gear series.

It was released in 2006 for the PlayStation 2.
The game is set in a world where humans and demons coexist.
The main character is a human boy named Adell who is trying to lift a curse placed on his family by a powerful demon.
The game features a unique leveling system where characters can level up to 9999 and deal millions of points of damage.

games.name: Disgaea 3: Absence of Justice
hints: This game is a tactical role-playing game.
It was developed by Nippon Ichi Software and released in 2008.
The game is set in a school for demons, where the main character is a delinquent student trying to become the Overlord.
The game features a unique gameplay mechanic called the "Item World", where players can enter items in their inventory and battle through randomly generated levels to power them up.
The game has multiple endings, including a "bad" ending that can be achieved by making certain choices throughout the game.

hints: This game is a tactical role-playing game.
It was developed by Nippon Ichi Software and released in 2011.
The game features a cast of quirky and memorable characters, including demons and angels.
The game's combat system allows for complex and strategic battles, with a focus on positioning and teamwork.
The game has a high level cap, allowing players to level up their characters to absurdly high levels and deal massive amounts of damage.

The game is set in a world where the demon emperor Void Dark has taken over and the player must lead a rebellion against him.
The game features a unique leveling system where characters can level up to 9999 and deal massive amounts of damage.
The game has a humorous and quirky tone, with characters breaking the fourth wall and referencing other video games.

games.name: Fallout 2
aliases: Fallout 2: A Post Nuclear Role Playing Game
hints: This game was released in the late 90s.
It is a post-apocalyptic RPG set in a world devastated by nuclear war.
The game was developed by Black Isle Studios and published by Interplay Entertainment.
The game features a turn-based combat system and a vast open world to explore.
The game is known for its dark humor, mature themes, and multiple ways to complete quests and interact with NPCs.

games.name: Fallout 3
aliases: Fallout 3: Game of the Year Edition
hints: This game was released in 2008.
It is a post-apocalyptic open-world RPG.
The game is set in a fictional version of Washington D.C. after a nuclear war.
The player character is a resident of a fallout shelter known as Vault 101, who must venture out into the wasteland to find their missing father.
The game features a karma system, where the player's actions can affect their reputation and how NPCs interact with them.

games.name: Fallout: New Vegas
hints: This game is set in a post-apocalyptic world.
It was developed by Obsidian Entertainment and published by Bethesda Softworks.
The game takes place in the Mojave Wasteland, a region that was not featured in the previous Fallout games.
The player takes on the role of a courier who is left for dead and must navigate the dangerous wasteland to find out who tried to kill them.
The game features multiple factions that the player can ally with or oppose, leading to different endings and outcomes.

The game features an open-world environment, allowing players to explore and complete missions at their own pace.

games.name: BioShock 2
hints: This game was released in 2010 as a sequel to a popular first-person shooter game.
The game is set in an underwater city called Rapture, which was built in the 1940s as a utopian society.
The player takes on the role of a Big Daddy, a genetically enhanced human who is tasked with protecting a Little Sister, a young girl who can extract a valuable substance called ADAM from corpses.
The game features a morality system, where the player's choices affect the game's ending.
The game received critical acclaim for its story, atmosphere, and gameplay mechanics, and is considered one of the best games of its generation.

games.name: BioShock

The game features a unique storyline that explores themes of objectivism, free will, and the consequences of unchecked scientific progress.

The game has received critical acclaim for its immersive world-building, storytelling, and gameplay mechanics.

games.name: Tetris
hints: This game was created in the Soviet Union in 1984.
It is a puzzle game that involves fitting different shaped blocks together to form complete lines.
The game has been released on over 50 different platforms, making it one of the most widely ported video games of all time.
The game's name comes from the Greek numerical prefix "tetra-", which means "four", and refers to the fact that all of the game's pieces are made up of four blocks.
The game has been studied by scientists and researchers for its effects on the brain, and has been found to improve cognitive functions such as spatial reasoning and working memory.

It is a life simulation game where players control virtual people, known as Sims, and guide them through their daily lives.
The game features a "Create-A-Sim" tool that allows players to customize the appearance and personality of their Sims.
The game introduced the concept of "Aspiration Points," which Sims can earn by achieving their goals and desires, and can be used to purchase rewards.
The game has several expansion packs that add new features and gameplay elements, such as pets, seasons, and nightlife.

hints: This game was first released in 1980.
It is an arcade game where the player controls a character that moves around a maze-like environment.
The objective of the game is to eat all the pellets while avoiding ghosts that chase the player.

Pac-Man is considered one of the most iconic and influential video games of all time, and has been adapted into numerous sequels, spin-offs, and merchandise.

games.name: Grand Theft Auto 2
hints: This game was released in 1999.
It is an open-world action-adventure game.
The game is set in a fictional city that is heavily inspired by New York City and Chicago.
The game features a "wanted" system where the player can become wanted by the police for committing crimes.
The game was the first in the series to feature a top-down perspective, which was later replaced by a third-person perspective in later games.

The game has a multiplayer mode called Grand Theft Auto Online, which allows players to create their own characters and participate in various activities with other players.

games.name: Grand Theft Auto III
hints: This game was released in 2001.
It is an open-world action-adventure game.
The game is set in a fictional city based on New York City.
The game was developed by Rockstar Games, the same studio behind the popular game series Red Dead Redemption and Max Payne.
The game was revolutionary for its time, introducing a 3D open-world environment and allowing players to freely explore and interact with the game world.

The game features a variety of vehicles that the player can use to navigate the city, including cars, boats, and helicopters.
The game's soundtrack includes music from the 1980s, including popular songs from artists like Michael Jackson and A-ha.
The game was developed by Rockstar North and is part of the popular Grand Theft Auto series.

hints: This game is the second installment in a popular action-adventure game series.
The game was released in 2003 for the PlayStation 2.
The game features two playable characters, Dante and Lucia, each with their own unique abilities and weapons.
The game received mixed reviews upon release, with some critics praising its graphics and gameplay, while others criticized its lack of difficulty and repetitive level design.
The game's director, Hideaki Itsuno, later apologized for the game's shortcomings and went on to direct several more successful games in the series, including Devil May Cry 3 and 5.

It is a first-person shooter game that is known for its fast-paced action and intense violence.
The game was developed by id Software, a company that is also known for creating other popular first-person shooter games like Quake and Wolfenstein.
The game takes place on a research facility on Mars that has been overrun by demons from Hell.
The game has been remade and re-released multiple times, with the most recent version being released in 2016.

It is an action role-playing game that takes place in a dark fantasy world.
The game features five character classes, each with unique abilities and skills.
Players can team up with others online to battle demons and other monsters.
The game was highly praised for its storyline, graphics, and addictive gameplay, and is considered a classic in the genre.

The game was developed by Rare, the same studio behind popular games like Donkey Kong Country and Banjo-Kazooie.
The game features a combo system that allows skilled players to chain together long strings of attacks.
The game was rebooted in 2013 as a launch title for the Xbox One, featuring updated graphics and new gameplay mechanics.

It is a puzzle game that involves building structures using balls of goo.
The game was developed by an independent game studio called 2D Boy.

games.name: Disco Elysium
hints: This game is a role-playing game (RPG) that was released in 2019.
The game is set in a fictional city called Revachol, which is inspired by real-world European cities.
The game features an open-world environment where players can explore and interact with various characters.
The game has a unique dialogue system where players can choose from a variety of responses that can affect the outcome of the game.
The game has won numerous awards for its writing, storytelling, and innovative gameplay mechanics.

999: Nine Hours Nine Persons Nine Doors
hints: This game is a visual novel and puzzle game hybrid.
It was released for the Nintendo DS in 2009.
The game's story revolves around nine characters who are kidnapped and forced to participate in a deadly game.
The game features multiple endings, with the true ending requiring the player to solve all the puzzles and make certain choices.
The game is the first entry in a trilogy of games known as the Zero Escape series, which also includes Virtue's Last Reward and Zero Time Dilemma.

It was released in 2015 and is exclusive to PlayStation consoles.
The game takes place in a remote mountain lodge where a group of friends gather for a weekend getaway.
The player's choices and actions throughout the game determine the fate of the characters and the outcome of the story.
The game features a unique "Butterfly Effect" system where even small choices can have significant consequences later in the game.

hints: This game was first released in 2001 as a browser-based MMORPG.
It is set in a medieval fantasy world and features various skills and quests for players to complete.
The game has a free-to-play version, as well as a members-only version with additional content.
The game has undergone several major updates and graphical overhauls over the years.
The game has a dedicated fanbase and is known for its social aspects, with players often forming clans and alliances to complete quests and take on challenges together.

games.name: Animal Crossing: Wild World
hints: This game was released for the Nintendo DS in 2005.
It is a life simulation game where the player moves to a new town and interacts with animal characters.
The game features real-time gameplay, meaning that the time of day and year in the game matches that of the player's real-world location.
The player can customize their character's appearance and home, as well as participate in various activities such as fishing and bug catching.
The game has since been followed by several sequels, including Animal Crossing: New Horizons for the Nintendo Switch, which became a cultural phenomenon in 2020.

games.name: Animal Crossing: New Horizons
hints: This game was released in 2020 for the Nintendo Switch.
It is a life simulation game where players move to a deserted island and build a community with anthropomorphic animals.
The game features real-time gameplay, meaning that the time of day and season in the game matches that of the player's real-world location.
Players can customize their character and their island with various items and decorations.
The game has become a cultural phenomenon, with many players using it as a form of escapism during the COVID-19 pandemic.

The game was highly praised for its innovative gameplay mechanics and is considered a landmark title in the first-person shooter genre.

The game was developed by Konami and directed by the famous game designer, Masahiro Ito.

The game is known for its psychological horror elements, multiple endings, and iconic monster designs.

hints: This game was released in 2005.
It is a turn-based strategy game where players build and manage their own civilization.
The game was developed by Firaxis Games, the same studio behind the popular game series XCOM.
The game features a variety of victory conditions, including military conquest, cultural domination, and scientific achievement.
The game has received numerous expansions and mods, including a popular mod called "Fall from Heaven" which adds a fantasy element to the game.

It was released in 2010 and is the fifth installment in a popular game franchise.
The game allows players to build and manage their own civilization, from ancient times to the modern era.
The game features a variety of victory conditions, including military conquest, cultural dominance, and scientific achievement.
The game was developed by Firaxis Games and designed by Sid Meier, a legendary game designer known for his work on classic games like Pirates! and Railroad Tycoon.

It is a fighting game featuring characters from both the Marvel Comics and Capcom universes.
The game features a tag team system, allowing players to switch between characters during a match.
The game has a large roster of playable characters, including popular Marvel heroes like Spider-Man and Wolverine, as well as Capcom characters like Ryu and Mega Man.
The game is considered one of the best fighting games of all time and has been featured in numerous competitive gaming tournaments.

It is a first-person shooter game developed by Rare, the same studio behind the popular game series Donkey Kong Country and Banjo-Kazooie.
The game features a female protagonist named Joanna Dark who is a secret agent.
The game has a variety of weapons and gadgets that can be used to complete missions.
The game was critically acclaimed and is considered one of the best games of all time in the first-person shooter genre.

The game introduces a new gameplay mechanic called the "Striker System," which allows players to call in an off-screen character to assist them in battle.
The game has been re-released multiple times on various platforms, including as part of a compilation of classic fighting games.

games.name: The King of Fighters XIII
hints: This game was released in 2010.
It is a fighting game featuring characters from various SNK franchises.
The game features a 3-on-3 battle system, where players can switch between characters during a match.
The game has a large roster of playable characters, with over 30 fighters to choose from.
The game received critical acclaim for its deep gameplay mechanics, beautiful hand-drawn graphics, and memorable soundtrack.

games.name: Spenlunky
hints: This game was originally released as freeware in 2008.
It is a 2D platformer with randomly generated levels.
The game features permadeath, meaning that when the player dies, they must start over from the beginning.
The player character is an adventurer who must navigate through dangerous caves filled with traps and enemies.
The game has a cult following and has been praised for its challenging gameplay and replayability.

games.name: Spenlunky 2
hints: This game is a sequel to a popular indie game released in 2008.
It is a platformer game that features randomly generated levels.
The game was developed by Derek Yu and his team at Mossmouth.
The game features a multiplayer mode that allows up to four players to play together.
The game was released in 2020 for PC and PlayStation 4, and later for Xbox One and Nintendo Switch.
